name: Dynamic Forms
description: Train in the fluid, high-speed movements of Wushu forms for agility and precision.

cards.title: Chain Punching Combination
cards.description: A rapid sequence of punches designed to overwhelm opponents with speed.
bulletpoints: Ensure minimal telegraphing for faster execution

cards.title: Tornado Kick Combo
cards.description: A spinning kick sequence that blends power with acrobatics.
bulletpoints: Generate momentum through a full-body rotation
Keep the supporting foot grounded for balance
